trans-unit.source: An illusion (or portion of an illusion) that you create using [Minor Illusion]{1} or related ability that fits within a 10-foot (3 m) cube becomes permanent. You can permanently end the illusion as an action, but others must expend exceptional ingenuity to prevent the illusion from regenerating even if it has apparently been dispersed.
trans-unit.target: An illusion (or portion of an illusion) that you create using [Minor Illusion]{1} or related ability that fits within a 10-foot (3 m) cube becomes permanent. You can permanently end the illusion as an action, but others must expend exceptional ingenuity to prevent the illusion from regenerating even if it has apparently been dispersed.
